name: Peter Hartman
tagline: I want to solve your problem
body:
### Welcome to my corner of the web
I am a UK based product manager currently working in the retail sector on a leading SaaS product that aims to dramatically improve sales on online shops.

In my spare time I am mainly focused on keeping my son Noah out of trouble:
![Who me?](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/xq0921s90muglo0/nLNiSk9eXz/20121118%20150602%200002-Noah.jpg) 

### Get in contact
I am always up for meeting new people especially if you are based in london and drink your coffee strong.

Feel free to get in contact:
github@peterhartman.co.uk


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
